thumb.title: スノーボード Zermatt
thumb.description: Footage from 15 and 16 February 2024, in Zermatt. Unfortunately I catched an edge early on arrival and that fall ruined a lot of the snowboarding "vibes" that day, the view made up for it tho, just look at the Matterhorn/Cervino mountain! Most of the footage is from the second day when I started to get more comfortable with the board. 0:00 Intro0:48 Ride from Matterhorn Glacier Paradise7:59 Break (Testa Grigia)9:47 Second ride17:00 Chair lift view17:48 More rides20:15 Goat moment@haraldrevery Zermatt, Switzerland & Cervinia, Italy 2024
